name: Yohoho.io
description: Play as a pirate on themed islands, collect coins, open chests, and defeat other players using your dash ability.

name: Poly Track
description: A fast-paced, low-poly driving game with loops, jumps, and high-speed action inspired by TrackMania.

name: Geometry Dash
description: A rhythm-based action platformer where you jump, fly, and flip through challenging obstacles.

name: Drive Mad
description: An arcade driving game with challenging courses, obstacles, and stunts for a thrilling experience.
Slide tiles to combine numbers and reach the 2048 tile in this addictive puzzle game.

name: Among Us
description: A multiplayer social deduction game where players complete tasks or secretly act as imposters.

name: Angry Sharks
description: Become the ultimate predator in this shark-themed action game and rule the underwater world.

name: Awesome Tanks
description: Smash enemy tanks, upgrade your weapons, and create custom levels to challenge players worldwide.

name: Ballistic Chicken
description: Launch chickens from a cannon and see how far you can make them fly in this quirky physics game.

name: Basketball Random
description: A fun and unpredictable basketball game with quirky physics and random gameplay elements.

name: Basketball Bros
description: Fast-paced one-on-one basketball with unique characters and skills.

name: Bitlife
description: A text-based life simulator where players make choices to experience a virtual life.

name: Ragdoll Hit
description: Equip your hero and battle in physics-based arenas for epic action-packed fun.

name: Breakoid
description: Bounce the ball with your paddle to break bricks and progress through challenging levels.

name: BreakTheBank (Henry Stickman)
description: Help Henry Stickmin break into a bank by choosing from a series of risky decisions.

name: Cannonbasket4
description: Aim and shoot the ball into the basket using physics-based cannon mechanics.

name: Champion Island
description: Compete in sports challenges, mini-games, and discover secrets on a charming island.

name: Territorial.io
description: Expand your territory and dominate the map in this strategic multiplayer game.

name: Creative Kill Chamber
description: Use creative methods to eliminate enemies and escape each level in this action puzzle game.

name: Minecraft
description: Explore, build, and survive in this iconic sandbox game with online multiplayer support.

name: Cookie Clicker
description: An incremental idle game where you bake cookies and unlock upgrades to increase production.

name: Core Ball
description: Solve puzzles by manipulating balls and cores to reach the goal in each level.

name: Doge Miner
description: Mine resources, collect Dogecoins, and upgrade your operations in this idle mining game.

name: CSGO Clicker
description: Click and upgrade to earn points, unlock skins, and experience incremental gameplay.

name: Among Us
description: Identify the imposters among crewmates in this social deduction game.

name: Drift Boss
description: Drift through tracks, earn points, and complete challenges in this fast-paced racing game.

name: Edge Surf
description: Perform tricks and surf along challenging edges in this high-speed action game.

name: EuroCup
description: Compete in football matches and tournaments in this sports action game.

name: FactoryBallz
description: Solve complex ball-routing puzzles across multiple levels with creative solutions.

name: Gunspin
description: Spin your guns and take out enemies in this fast-paced action shooter game.

name: Idle Breakout
description: Click and automate blocks to progress through this incremental breakout-style game.

name: Monkey Mart
description: Manage a shop, sell items, and expand your business in this idle management game.

name: OvO
description: Engage in fast-paced action challenges in this skill-based arcade game.
